unnormalised: Hey students, ditch the scholarship stress! Finding the right financial aid just got easier, thanks to the rise of scholarship portals! Forget scouring endless websites and contacting every college from IIT Delhi to Anna University. These portals are like online biryani feasts - a delicious mix of opportunities catered to you.
normalised: Hey students, ditch the scholarship stress! Finding the right financial aid just got easier, thanks to the rise of scholarship portals! Forget scouring endless websites and contacting every college from I I T Delhi to Anna University. These portals are like online biryani feasts - a delicious mix of opportunities catered to you.

unnormalised: Think of them as your personalized scholarship gurus. Many now offer AI-powered matching, suggesting scholarships based on your grades, interests (maybe you're a budding coder from Bengaluru!), and even community (gotta support the Kerala community with Onam just around the corner!).
normalised: Think of them as your personalized scholarship gurus. Many now offer A I powered matching, suggesting scholarships based on your grades, interests (maybe you're a budding coder from Bengaluru!), and even community (gotta support the Kerala community with Onam just around the corner!).

unnormalised: These portals are not just for the academically gifted either; there are specific scholarships for sports, arts and even specific caste students. Some even offer stipends ranging from Rs. 5000 to Rs. 50,000 per year!
normalised: These portals are not just for the academically gifted either; there are specific scholarships for sports, arts and even specific caste students. Some even offer stipends ranging from rupees five thousand to rupees fifty thousand per year!

unnormalised: Don't miss out! Sites like Vidyalakshmi portal are bridging the gap between deserving students and needed funds. Time to dig in and find YOUR perfect scholarship!
normalised: Don't miss out! Sites like Vidyalakshmi portal are bridging the gap between deserving students and needed funds. Time to dig in and find YOUR perfect scholarship!
